analysis.description:
LemoCoin.clearExpiredFreezing (/unique_chucks/29/0xd6e354f07319e2474491d8c7c712137bee6862a2.sol#290-319) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nodes[right].end_stamp > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/29/0xd6e354f07319e2474491d8c7c712137bee6862a2.sol#312-314)
	- nodes[left].end_stamp <= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/29/0xd6e354f07319e2474491d8c7c712137bee6862a2.sol#300-302)

LemoCoin.validBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/29/0xd6e354f07319e2474491d8c7c712137bee6862a2.sol#319-331) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nodes[i].end_stamp > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/29/0xd6e354f07319e2474491d8c7c712137bee6862a2.sol#330-331)

LemoCoin.setFreezing (/unique_chucks/29/0xd6e354f07319e2474491d8c7c712137bee6862a2.sol#339-353) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < end_stamp) (/unique_chucks/29/0xd6e354f07319e2474491d8c7c712137bee6862a2.sol#342)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/29/0xd6e354f07319e2474491d8c7c712137bee6862a2.sol:
